description: Gets the status of the Service Linked Role (SLR) deployment for the accounts in a given Amazon Web Services Organization.

nested_items.name: OrganizationStatus
nested_items.description: Displays the status of an Amazon Web Services Organization.

nested_items.name: OrganizationId
nested_items.description: The ID of an Amazon Web Services Organization.

nested_items.name: OrganizationAwsServiceAccessStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the organization's AWS service access. This will be ENABLED or DISABLED.

nested_items.name: SLRDeploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the SLR deployment for the account. This will be either SUCCEEDED or IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: AccountStatusList
nested_items.description: The current service-linked role (SLR) deployment status for an Amazon Web Services Organization's accounts. This will be either SUCCEEDED or IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of an account within the Amazon Web Services Organization.

nested_items.name: SLRDeploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of SLR deployment for the account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next page of results.
